The movie is about nothing. The film lacks the humanism that characterized the best of American films, so it is depressing to watch. It is nothing more than a group of wealthy white folks from San Francisco sitting around talking about problems that only they experience. The dialogue is shallow, the plot doesn't go anywhere, and all it leads to is a feeling of helplessness and hopelessness.
